1001010001110001 0011111010100011 1 -> sum: 1101001100010101, cout: 0
0010011011010111 0101100011110001 1 -> sum: 0111111111001001, cout: 0
1110010000000110 1111100100011000 1 -> sum: 1101110100011111, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
